org.conqat.lib.commons.test.mockserver

Class MockServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.test.mockserver.MockServer

  • public class MockServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstraction of a mock server. The mock server can act as reverse proxy between your test and a 3rd party system you want to integrate with. The mock server is able to record HTTP traffic and replay it afterwards so that you do not need a connection to the 3rd party system during regular test execution. This speeds up test execution and also separates data changes on the 3rd party system from your test logic. A concrete instance of this class will be injected to test methods if the class is annotated with MockServerTest. It provides access to an URL pointing either to the mock reverse proxy or the live system, depending on the configured execution mode.
